description:
gofmt: indent multi-line signatures

There may be more fine-tuning down the line,
but this CL fixes the most pressing issue at
hand.

Also: gofmt -w src misc

Fixes issue 1524.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=853954e5f7ac ***

gofmt: indent multi-line signatures

There may be more fine-tuning down the line,
but this CL fixes the most pressing issue at
hand.

Also: gofmt -w src misc

Fixes issue 1524.

R=rsc, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/4975053

LGTM

I'm very happy about this change.  :)

Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Maybe add some testdata cases for multi-line methods in an interface too?


On Fri, Sep 2, 2011 at 8:08 PM, <gri@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: rsc,
>
> Message:
> Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>

> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>

> Description:
> gofmt: indent multi-line signatures
>
> There may be more fine-tuning down the line,
> but this CL fixes the most pressing issue at
> hand.
>
> Also: gofmt -w src misc
>
> Fixes issue 1524.
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**4975053/<http://codereview.appspot.com/4975053/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M misc/cgo/test/helpers.go
>  M src/pkg/go/printer/nodes.go
>  M src/pkg/go/printer/testdata/**declarations.golden
>  M src/pkg/go/printer/testdata/**expressions.golden
>  M src/pkg/go/printer/testdata/**expressions.input
>  M src/pkg/go/printer/testdata/**expressions.raw
>
>
>

PTAL.

(Also moved test cases into testdata/declarations.input - they are
declarations and not expressions after all).
- gri
